title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 712-1.22 - Laundry departments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 712-1.22 - Laundry departments

State Regulations

Where laundry services are included within a hospital, such spaces shall contain a soiled linen holding room and a clean linen storage
room and be adequate in area and layout for the services to be
provided. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
712-1.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
